item.title: Manage Azure VMs with System Center Virtual Machine Manager (SCVMM)
item.description: With Update Rollup 6 it is possible to add one or more Azure subscriptions to SCVMM 2012 R2. When the Azure subscription is added in SCVMM, it is possible to perform some basic actions such as: Add and Remove one or more Azure subscriptions by using the VMM console. See a list view with details and status of all role instances in all deployments in that subscription. Manually refresh the list of instances.
